This top is really cute but ran really small. I wear between 1 and 2X. Ordered 2X and can’t wear it. Maybe I will order 2 sizes up.
Very cheap looking and not as pictured. Material is cheap polyester.

This top is a much higher quality than expected.  The fit is good - true to size.  Colors are vibrant, material is soft and stretchy.  The sleeves add the boho look I wanted.  Looks great with jeans.  I have washed several times and hung to dry and it still looks great.  Have received many compliments.
This top looks subdued colorwise. It also looks like a much smaller dainty print. What I have is a gaudy colored larger than life print . Very disappointed.

评论概述: You may not receive what you ordered but....
评论详情: What I received did not match the graphic print of what I ordered. That being said, I do like what was sent. I love the soft ruffle at the sleeve and the fabric. I'll be keeping this piece. I may not order from this seller again because you may not receive what you ordered. Plus it took a long time to arrive but in the end I'm happy with what I received.
Thought the color was pretty but the finishing was a white stitch that stood out and the cut unflattering.
This top is pretty and I love the sleeves. They are not too large and hang at a nice place. Colors and pattern like the picture. Very cute. Looks good tucked in to jeans or skirts.
